AlekSIS (School Information System) — App Hjelp (FAQ and support)
=================================================================

AlekSIS
-------

This is an application for use with the `AlekSIS®`_ platform.

Features
--------

* Report issues
* Frequently asked questions
* Ask questions
* Feedback
